code: import React,{useContext,useState}from"react";import{Context}from"../Context";import switchoverhead from"../assets/icons/switch_overhead.svg";import switchcurrent from"../assets/icons/switch_current.svg";import{Link,useLocation,useHistory}from"react-router-dom";import useKeyPress from"../hooks/useKeyPress";import constants from"../constants";var StatusView=function StatusView(){var _useContext=useContext(Context),status=_useContext.status;var _useLocation=useLocation(),pathname=_useLocation.pathname;var history=useHistory();useKeyPress(function(key){if(status===constants.SETTING_UP)return;if(key==="Space"){if(pathname==="/grid")history.push("/info");else history.push("/grid");}});return!status?React.createElement(Link,{to:pathname==="/grid"?"/info":"/grid",className:"status-view"},React.createElement("img",{src:pathname==="/grid"?switchoverhead:switchcurrent,alt:""})):React.createElement("div",{className:"status-view"},React.createElement("p",{className:"status"},status));};export default StatusView;
